title: Tennis Shoes Among the Nephites
author: Chris Heimerdinger
synopsis: Jim Hawkins is a bored 12 year old in Wyoming. He, his sister, and the school nerd he bullies fall down a waterfall inside a local cave, and wind up in Nephite history.

title: The Flight Girls
author: Noelle Salazar
synopsis: Audrey Coltrane is a military flight instructor in Hawaii in 1941. She and her friends try to find their way forward after Pearl Harbor is bombed.

title: Rebekah: Women of Genesis
author: Orson Scott Card
synopsis: Rebekah leaves her father's house to marry Isaac, son of Abraham, she struggles to find her place in the patriarch's family and her own path to serving God. Sensitive to Christian tradition but also to the plight of women in Biblical times, this imaginative, inspiring story offers a unique look at early Christianity's domestic culture.

title: Fire of the Covenant--
author: Gerald N. Lund
synopsis: Trapped by early winter snows in Wyoming, these Saints driven by the 'fire of the covenant' they had made with God rose to height of unsurpassed courage and endurance. Their story will thrill you to the core.

title: Praying with the Enemey
author: Steven T. Collins
synopsis: When pilot Captain Ward Millar is forced to eject over enemy territory in North Korea, the ejection explosion snaps both of his ankles. Unable to walk, he is easily captured by North Korean and Chinese soldiers who interrogate, threaten, and starve him for strategic wartime information.
